content: This is what keeps me coming back to Medium. The ability to follow writers and topics — big and small — has made for an incredibly rich reading and discovery experience. It reminds me of Twitter’s summary emails, and “what happened while you were gone.” Difference being that Medium has the content in a consistently beautiful and usable form, not just a link to poorly formatted, unresponsive, ad and embed -infested content (with a poor commenting system). Medium is a community and service I didn’t know I was missing until I discovered it.
